answers.junior: try contains code that might throw exceptions. catch handles exceptions. finally always executes. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
answers.middle: try-catch-finally ensures cleanup code runs regardless of exceptions. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Multiple catch blocks can handle different exception types.
answers.senior: finally executes even if try/catch has return statements. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Return values in finally override try/catch returns. Consider try-with-resources as cleaner alternative.
answers.tricky: Discuss finally block edge cases, return value precedence, exception suppression, and interaction with System.exit(). Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
